title: Ukraine War Tests the Power of Tech Giants - The New York Times
content:
1. Ukraine War Tests the Power of Tech Giants  The New York Times
  2. Big Tech's Efforts to Support Ukraine Shift the Industry's Role in a Time of War  CNET
  3. Flood of Russian misinformation puts tech companies in the hot seat  The Guardian
  4. Facebook, Apple and Other Tech Giants Face Rising Pressure Over Ukraine  The Wall Street Journal
  5. Analysis: Moscow battles big tech to control the narrative  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Google, Meta, Twitter, Telegram and others are levers in the conflict, caught between demands from Ukraine, Russia, the European Union and the U.S.
